model_id: Unique identifier for all the PDXs derived from the same tissue sample
URL: Link to the model image Description of the image on what was being imaged
description: Type of sample being imaged Passage number imaging was performed.
sample_type: Passage 0 correspond to first engraftment (if this is not the case please define how passages are numbered).
passage: Magnification of the mode image Staining used for imaging the sample

description: P2 tumor ID018 for PDX model J000077451 stained for H&E.
